original_text: And there shall be a great cry throughout all the land of Egypt, such as there was none like it, nor shall be like it any more.
korean_text: 애굽 온 땅에 전무후무한 큰 부르짖음이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: And there shall be a great cry
throughout all the land of Egypt,
such as there was none like it,
nor shall be like it any more.
sentences.korean_translation: 다시는 그와 같은 것이 없을 것이다.
